name: Lumbrojacks
description:
We rise by lifting others!

And as our Lumbrojacks are real Bros, they're helping each other reach the top of the tree... or is there really a treetop?

Controls :
Movement : W = left and D = right, or Gamepad left-right.
Axe Swing : Mouse left-click when chopper near a branch, or Gamepad X
Jump : Spacebar, or Gamepad A. Hit it again for double jump.

Design by : Lurked, MicroManiac and Narva

Art by : MicroManiac
Code by : Lurked
Music and SFX by : Narva

Game built in C# on Monogame Framework.
